arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of snapshot copy grant

kmsKeyId.description: The unique identifier for the customer master key (CMK) that the grant applies to. Specify the key ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK. To specify a CMK in a different AWS account, you must use the key ARN. If not specified, the default key is used.

snapshotCopyGrantName.description: A friendly name for identifying the grant.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. .If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
